organic_results.title: Race, class, and tournament track mobility
organic_results.snippet: Early research on track mobility suggested that students follow a tournament mobility process, but more recent research has failed to support the tournament mobility metaphor. These analyses attempted to discern the overall pattern of mobility. This study used data from High School and Beyond to investigate track mobility for four different disaggregated racial-class groups. By disaggregating the data, the authors were able to determine whether all groups follow the same pattern of mobility or whether groups experience different mobility …
